pl=df[{'Year','Palestinians Injuries','Year'}]

source.82500f3d:
plt.rc('font', size=12)
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

ax.plot(df['Year'], df['Palestinians Killed'], color='tab:red', label='Palestinians Killed')
ax.set_xlabel('Years')
ax.set_ylabel('Count')
ax.set_title('Palestinians Killed')
ax.grid(True)
ax.legend(loc='upper left')

plt.rc('font', size=12)
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

ax.plot(df['Year'], df['Israelis Killed'], color='tab:blue', label='Israelis Killed')
# Same as above
ax.set_xlabel('Years')
ax.set_ylabel('Count')
ax.set_title('Israelis Killed')
ax.grid(True)
ax.legend(loc='upper left')

# 1. Introduction:
- People around the world are fully aware of what is happening in occupied Palestine. Current events in occupied Palestine are, in fact, another manifestation of the oppressive, colonialist Zionist occupation which the Palestinian people has endured for more than 50 years. The Palestinian people needs and deserves our solidarity. This notebook is showing a conflict between Palestinians (land owners) and Israeli occupation.

### The Human Cost is 127910 Including 121475 Palestinians.
-  Sustained attention by the international community to the human rights situation in occupied Palestine was needed But, unfortunately, the situation of occupied Palestine is deteriorating day by day. We are risking an economic and humanitarian catastrophe, if the international community does not find rapid solutions in all areas and at all levels to put an end to this ongoing tragedy.
